findAttributePosInCompositeTuple

public int findAttributePosInCompositeTuple(int pos,
                                            int res,
                                            Tuple tuple,
                                            Catalog catalog)
Find the index position of a given attribute, when the tuple derives from two other tuples, ie. has already been in a join.

Parameters:
pos - the index position of the stream in the derivesFrom list
res - the index position of the attribute in the stream it belongs to.
Returns:
The index position of the attribute in the tuple.

findPosOfStreamInTheDerivesFromList

public int findPosOfStreamInTheDerivesFromList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list,
                                               java.lang.String streamname)
In the case the tuple has already been to an index of the current stream, find the stream in the list of the SteMs it has already been to.

Parameters:
list - the list of the SteMs the tuple has already been to.
streamname - the stream we are looking for in the list.
Returns:
The position in the list.
